inputs.selection_motivation: The wti→ust2y link offers the weakest incremental cross‑asset insight compared to other Treasury maturities and has the least robust catalyst support for oil‑price driven rate movements.
inputs.motivation: The wti→ust2y link offers the weakest incremental cross‑asset insight compared to other Treasury maturities and has the least robust catalyst support for oil‑price driven rate movements.

prioritized_link.motivation: Oil price shocks materially alter inflation expectations and risk‑premia, which drive the steepening of the long‑term yield curve; thus WTI directly influences the 30‑year Treasury yield.

llm_raw_response.motivation: The wti→ust2y link offers the weakest incremental cross‑asset insight compared to other Treasury maturities and has the least robust catalyst support for oil‑price driven rate movements.

removal_decision.motivation: The wti→ust2y link offers the weakest incremental cross‑asset insight compared to other Treasury maturities and has the least robust catalyst support for oil‑price driven rate movements.
